text:
RELIGION:

Ramayanam: R. Krishnamurthy; Sri Sankara Gurukulam, C.P. Ramaswamy Street, Abhiramapuram, 6-45 p.m.

Srimad Bhagavatham: Sundara Kumar, Harihara Dhyana Nilayam, Chimaya Mission Yoga Center II, Chinmaya Nagar, 6-45 p.m.

Vivekachoodamani: R. Rajapogal, Sri Sankara Gurukulam, C.P. Ramaswamy Street, Abhiramapuram, 4-30 p.m.

Aitareya Upanishad: Satyavratananda Saraswati, Shiridi Sai temple, Shenoy Nagar, 5-30 p.m.

Thirumurai: E. Chokalingam, 9/5, T.T.K. Salai, Royapettah, 6. 30 p.m.

Sri Thyagaraja Kirthigal: Ganesh, Sitadevi Garodia Hindu Vidyalaya, 2, Kalamegam Street, East Tambaram, 6-45 p.m.

Samboth Foundation: Spiritual lecture by Swamini Bodhananda, Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan, Mylapore, 6-15 p.m.

GENERAL:

Department of Journalism and Communication, University of Madras: Seminar on Radio in Times of Disaster, AV Studio, Tower Clock Building, 11 a.m.

Dr. MGR University: Academic staff college – faculty empowerment programme, Maduravoyal, 10 a.m.

Vancouver Film School: Workshop on Writing for film and television, M.O.P. Vaishnav College for Women, Nungambakkam, 9 p.m.

Maruppakam: “Velutha Rathirikal” film screening, MM Preview Theatre, T. Nagar, 5 p.m.

Ethiraj College for Women: Ed-Bazaar’ 16, Ethiraj College for Women, Egmore, 9 a.m.

Anna University: Tamil Nadu level placement programme, DMI College of Engineering, Palanchur, Kancheepuram, 9 a.m.

Madras Institute of Development Studies: Talk on Elemental India: India’s natural world at a time of crisis and opportunity, MIDS, Gandhi Nagar, Adyar, 3 p.m.

Chettinad Vidyashram: 6th Math Club Anniversary, Chettinad Vidyashram, Rajah Annamalaipuram, 10 a.m.

Palaniappa Brothers Publication: Founder’s Day celebrations, Indian Officers’ Association, Thiru-Vi-Ka High Road, Royapettah, 6-30 p.m.

Narcotics Anonymous: Meetings, Grace of the Millennium group, CSI Zion Church, Chintadripet; Reality Group, CSI Good Shepherd Church, Taramani 100 feet Road, Velachery, 7 p.m.

Al-Anon: Meetings, SOS Al Anon Group, Meston College of Education, Royapettah; Madipakkam Al-Anon Family Group, Moovarasampettai; Al-Anon Group, CSI Church, Padikuppam Road, Anna Nagar; Blossom Buds Group, The Lady of the Light Church, Mylapore; Anmeega Asthivara Group, Tiruvottiyur; Ebenezer MM School, Thirumullavoyal, 7 p.m.

Alcohlolics Anonymous: Meetings, Meston College, Royapettah; Chennai Corporation Public Health Centre, Adambakkam; Risen Redeemers Church, Kodambakkam; ECI Church, Padikuppam Road, Anna Nagar; Annai Velankanni Church, Luz; St. Johns Catholic Church, Tondiarpet; Ebenezr School, Thirumullavoyal; St. Josephs School, 18th West Cross Street, M.K.B. Nagar; C.S.I Church, Dasarapuram, Thiruninravur; English Language Meeting, P.S. Higher Secondary School, R.K. Mutt road, Mylapore, 7 p.m.
title: Chennai today
